Name: Robbed Money
About the game: Every self-respecting bandit has tried to rob the arrogant rich at least once. You have to collect the scattered bags of money, running away from the local sheriffs. Your accomplices are already waiting for you and are about to gallop away. Robbed Money is a hard top down game. Help the guy in the cowboy hat cheat the sheriff and his charges. But do not relax, every time you collect bags in a cart, your accomplices try to deceive you and leave without you. Collect the bags that they drop, but be careful they are very tricky, because they can drop not only money, but also bombs! Features of the game: - Nice graphics - Good background music - Variety of levels - Hardcore
